text: DWIM (936 kHz) is an AM radio station owned and operated by Aliw Broadcasting Corporation. The station's studio and transmitter are located at Brgy. Bayanan II, Calapan.Slain Mindoro broadcaster denied protection by courtCalapan broadcaster shot deadMindoro broadcaster killed; 33rd slain under Aquino ==References== Category:Radio stations established in 1995 Category:Radio stations in Mindoro
title: DWIM-AM
